attributes.action: Show Italia World Cup 1990 again in its entirety
attributes.additional_details: Italia 90 was a time of great national unity and pride and a great distraction from the day-to-day lives. We believe it would perform the same function once again
attributes.background: Instruct BBC and/or ITV to show entire Italia 1990 World Cup tournament (and, later, if successful, the 1996 Euros) as live during the lockdown

rejection.details: This is a matter for broadcasters.
